CustomField.description: AWS requires that Account ID is populated before referral moves to Stage = "Launched". We do not enforce it, so technically it's possible to move to "Launched" with this field being blanked, but it might not be propagated from WorkSpan to AWS.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 12 digit AWS Account number associated with the opportunity. Populate this before moving to Stage = "Launched".
CustomField.label: AWS Account ID
